    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnection(SQL.SQLType sqlType)
                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieve the (cached) SQL connection for the given type, e.g. an initialized MySQL connection. This method retries once. The established connection is maintained in a singleton variable until it is closed.
        Parameters:
        sqlType -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
